Created an attachment (id=5646)
cpp file where the exception is occurring

Attempted to reproduce this using the freshest from CVS HEAD.  

Instead of sending the error to the standard out, we now use the Eclipse 
logging service so that its not seen except by debuggers who have enabled 
tracing.  

The failure itself is unavoidable, as QUICK_PARSE does not follow inclusions, 
and this is a COM component implementation, with stuff like this in it: 

BEGIN_MESSAGE_MAP(COAutoGenDlg, CDialog)
	//{{AFX_MSG_MAP(COAutoGenDlg)
	ON_BN_CLICKED(IDYES, OnYes)
	ON_BN_CLICKED(IDYESALL,OnYesAll)
	ON_BN_CLICKED(IDNO,	OnNo)
	ON_BN_CLICKED(IDNOALL, OnNoAll)
	//}}AFX_MSG_MAP
END_MESSAGE_MAP()


These are all macros being used that we would find if we followed inclusions.  
Refer to https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=36730 for the full 
explanation.  

I consider this defect fixed, since no-one will know about the error now that 
we are tracing it rather than outputting it and that the QUICK_PARSE upgrade 
covers more than this issue.
